stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements about the use of executive agreements by presidents is supported by the data in the pie charts?

features.html:
Percentage of International Agreements That Were Executive Agreements

Source: Glenn Krutz and Jeffrey Peake, Treaty Politics and the Rise of Executive Agreements, University of Michigan Press, 2011

choicesHtml: The percentage of international agreements that were executive agreements has increased since 1839.
The percentage of international agreements that were executive agreements has decreased since 1839.
The percentage of international agreements that were executive agreements has decreased since 1989.
The percentage of international agreements that were executive agreements has increased since 1989.
